headline.print_headline: Low-Nicotine Cigarettes Cut Use, Dependence, Study Finds
headline.main: Low-Nicotine Cigarettes Cut Use, Dependence, Study Finds

docs.lead_paragraph: A new study might help the push for regulations to limit nicotine in cigarettes. Smokers who switched to special low-nicotine ones wound up smoking less and were more likely to try to quit, researchers found.
docs.snippet: A new study might help the push for regulations to limit nicotine in cigarettes. Smokers who switched to special low-nicotine ones wound up smoking less and were more likely to try to quit, researchers found.
